title: Mushroom

adjectives: Having the qualities or effects of a poison
Containing sufficient poison to be dangerous.
Containing sufficient poison to be dangerous
Of or pertaining to a fungus or fungi.
Of or pertaining to a fungus.
nouns: In culinary terms, a vegetable is an edible plant or its part, intended for cooking or eating raw.
A plant raised for some edible part of it.
Edible seeds or roots or stems or leaves or bulbs or tubers or nonsweet fruits of any of numerous herbaceous plant
Edible plant or part of a plant
A nutritional and culinary term that denotes any part of a plant that is commonly consumed by humans as food.
Any of various herbaceous plants having parts that are used as food.
The edible part of such a plant.

description: The edible fungus of the mushroom, depicted as a toadstool with a white-spotted red cap and stem.
apple_vendor_description: The mushroom emoji on Apple devices is a charming representation with a plump, reddish-brown cap and a sturdy, off-white stem, all rendered with Apple's characteristic soft, rounded edges and glossy texture. Realistic lighting highlights its gentle curves, giving it a friendly and approachable appearance. This emoji often symbolizes nature, foraging, growth, or can be used playfully to represent something unusual or even a bit magical.
